Description: Great ideas in, great results out! The secret to unlocking Copilot’s full potential starts with how you ask. In this session, we’ll break down the anatomy of a powerful prompt and show you how small tweaks can deliver dramatically better results. Through live demos in Word, Outlook, and Teams, you’ll see real-world examples and walk away with ready-to-use patterns for your own work. If you’re new to Copilot and want to avoid the “meh” outputs and go straight to “wow,” this session is a must!
Author: Microsoft Developer
Title: Prompt Crafting 101: Get Better Results with Copilot
